dialogue.fmn.goldenfeather: §8Right click to gain slow falling for 1s.
dialogue.fmn.villagers_weapon: A powerful weapon...only if you know how to use that.
dialogue.fmn.crafting_table: Middle click in hotbar to open directly.
dialogue.fmn.death: Eating soul remnant to increase max health.
dialogue.fmn.stone: Hold left alt to vein mine.
dialogue.fmn.deep: Deepslate ores may drop extra mineral.
dialogue.fmn.anvil: Iron blocks can be used to repair anvil.
dialogue.fmn.soul_star: 46 kills of hostile mobs drops 1 soul star.
dialogue.fmn.use_bottle: Glass bottles can be used to hold fancy dyes.
dialogue.fmn.soap: §8Soap can be used to remove dyes.
dialogue.fmn.boat: Shift + right click to get mobs out of the boat.
dialogue.fmn.guard_rc: Shift + right click with weapon to make jobless villager a guard.
dialogue.fmn.slime_ball: §8Can be used to craft sticky torch.
dialogue.fmn.gauntlet: Break all to summon gauntlet boss.
dialogue.fmn.altar: Charge all with soul star to summon lich boss.
dialogue.fmn.obsidilith: Charge with ender eye to summon obsidilith boss.
dialogue.fmn.ender_dragon: Defeating bosses might drop unique items.
dialogue.fmn.golden_key: Use golden key to open the chest anyways.
dialogue.fmn.rabbit: Rabbit hides can be crafted into bundles.
dialogue.fmn.recovery_pearl: §8Right click to teleport back to last death location.
dialogue.fmn.tp1: You have already been teleported to your death location.
dialogue.fmn.tp2: You will receive 5s resistance Ⅴ after teleport.
dialogue.fmn.obsidian: You can break obsidians faster now.
dialogue.fmn.grass: Only using hoes to break grasses or grass blocks gives you wheat seeds.
dialogue.fmn.horse: Horse armors can be crafted now.
dialogue.fmn.wolf: Wolf armors can be crafted now.
dialogue.fmn.amethyst: Amethysts won't grow now, but breaking budding amethyst gives amethyst shards.
dialogue.fmn.dirt: Press grave to toggle autopick, crouch/right click to pickup manually.
dialogue.fmn.fish: Right click water with vanilla fish frees them.
dialogue.fmn.redstone: Unless in desert or "that specific biome", redstones will only appear in "non-ore" form!
dialogue.fmn.minecart: §8Shift-right click to put a chest in.
dialogue.fmn.lowhp: Congrats! You won't lose max health on death now!
dialogue.fmn.waystone: You can't harvest naturally generated waystones.
dialogue.fmn.iron_golem: Most mob need to be killed by player to get drops.
dialogue.fmn.dismount: Enderman will leave minecart/boat when hurt by player.
dialogue.fmn.underwater: Getting hit underwater lowers your air level.
dialogue.fmn.magnet1: §8Left click with heart of the sea to upgrade.
dialogue.fmn.magnet2: §8Right click on a item to select.
dialogue.fmn.protection: You can avoid insta-death once for every 6 days.
dialogue.fmn.fire: When on fire, blocking damages your shield.
dialogue.fmn.nether: You are immune to fall damage in the nether.
dialogue.fmn.debug_stick: Shift + right click to change status.
dialogue.fmn.ladder: You can place ladder without supporting block.
dialogue.fmn.parrot: A parrot on shoulder keeps fall damage away.
dialogue.fmn.flint_and_steel: Fire won't spread in the overworld.
dialogue.fmn.ender_pearl: You can't use enderpearl in water.
dialogue.fmn.obsidian_placed: Nether portals can be built in any enclose shape.
dialogue.fmn.crying_obsidian: Nether portals can be built with crying obsidians.
dialogue.fmn.shield: Shields can only block limited amount of damage.
dialogue.fmn.piglin_trade: You can trade gold blocks or gold nuggets with piglins.
dialogue.fmn.diamond: In inventory, ctrl + enter to send the info of hovered item to chat.
dialogue.fmn.glow_berries: Glow berries can make you glow.
dialogue.fmn.ender_dragon_death: Being killed by ender dragon decreases your max health by 1 in total.
dialogue.fmn.normal_chest_mimic: You can use mimic handbell to tame mimics.
dialogue.fmn.mimic: Holding iron or gold block, you can crouch + right click on mimics to feed them.
dialogue.fmn.helper: There's hover information in the upper left of some containers.
dialogue.fmn.hot_biome: Take off armors/touch water/be underground/stay near respawn point to cool down.
dialogue.fmn.cold_biome: Take on full armor/be on fire/sprint/be underground/stay near respawn point to warm up.
dialogue.fmn.entity_drop: has disabled entity player kill check.
dialogue.fmn.no_entity_drop: has enabled entity player kill check.
dialogue.fmn.trade: has disabled trade lock of trapped villagers.
dialogue.fmn.no_trade: has enabled trade lock of trapped villagers.
dialogue.fmn.falling_star: Being direct hit by it may reward you something...
dialogue.fmn.goat_horn: Right click tamed mob to store in the horn.
dialogue.fmn.nether_wart: You can swap items with portals.
dialogue.fmn.gold_block: Gold blocks can be used to craft medallion of undying.
dialogue.fmn.soul_remnant_tip: The upper limit of max health is 40, excess will be stored.
dialogue.fmn.memory_removal: Revive the ender dragon to remove world memory.
dialogue.fmn.campfire: Right click the campfire with bare hand to take a nap.
dialogue.fmn.item_frame: Shift + right click with empty hand to hide the frame.
dialogue.fmn.coal_ore: Coal ore vein will collapse unless broken while crouching.
dialogue.fmn.oak_door: Crouch and left click on doors to knock them.
dialogue.fmn.dragon_breath1: After consuming, crouch to release dragon breath.
dialogue.fmn.water_bucket: Water buckets can be used to extinguish entities.
dialogue.fmn.recovery_compass: §8Can be used to craft the recovery pearl.
dialogue.fmn.elder_guardian: The elder guardian has been killed, mining fatigue removed!
dialogue.fmn.reveal_warn: §8Enchantments and curses on items that not revealed are hidden.
dialogue.fmn.hoe: Shift + right click with hoe to harvest in 3x3.
dialogue.fmn.hoe2: Shift + left click with hoe to destroy in 3x3.
dialogue.fmn.breeding: Shift + right click to breed animals in an area.
dialogue.fmn.free: Shift + right click with shears to set tamed mob free.
dialogue.fmn.path_failed: Can't create path(too far or can't reach).
dialogue.fmn.auto_path: Shift + right click with shovel to create a 3x3 path between two selected point.
dialogue.fmn.auto_path_cancel: Shift + right click towards air to remove start point.
dialogue.fmn.not_found: There's no item nearby this chest.
dialogue.fmn.dummy: Dummy can be used to test your damage.
dialogue.fmn.smithing_table: Smithing table can be used to upgrade or convert equipments.
dialogue.fmn.nether_portal: Try throwing a stone into portals!
dialogue.fmn.mob_farm: If too many monsters are shortly killed in a small area, there will spawn a vex!
dialogue.fmn.cauldron: Try cooking if you feel brewing is boring!
dialogue.fmn.zombie: Zombies can steal health, and take less knockback.
dialogue.fmn.skeleton: Skeleton shooters will flee from player.
dialogue.fmn.creeper1: Explosion power of creeper scales with its health.
dialogue.fmn.creeper2: Creepers can be fused by creeper explosion.
dialogue.fmn.slime1: Slimes or magma cubes can merge.
dialogue.fmn.slime2: Slimes or magma cubes can slow you.
dialogue.fmn.blaze: Melee attack of blazes can set you on fire.
dialogue.fmn.stray: Arrow of strays can freeze you.
dialogue.fmn.piglin1: Piglins are immune to fire and lava damage.
dialogue.fmn.piglin2: Without at least 2 pieces of golden armor, piglins will attack you.
dialogue.fmn.magma_cube: Melee attack of magma cubes can set you on fire.
dialogue.fmn.husk: Husks are immune to fire damage.
dialogue.fmn.wither_skeleton: Wither skeletons are immune to fire damage.
dialogue.fmn.fletching_table: Fletching table can be used to tighten the bow.
dialogue.fmn.sapling: Plants will try to plant themselves.
dialogue.fmn.villager_denial: Villager felt trapped and refused to trade.
dialogue.fmn.skull: §8Wither can only be summoned in the nether or the end.
dialogue.fmn.carved_pumpkin: §8Golems can only be summoned in the overworld.
dialogue.fmn.shears: §8Right click primed tnt to defuse it.
dialogue.fmn.tnt: Use gunpowder to delay the explosion.
dialogue.fmn.reforge_runic_dmg: §8Increase damage and decrease speed in fixed ratio.
dialogue.fmn.reforge_runic_spd: §8Increase speed and decrease damage in fixed ratio.
dialogue.fmn.runic_usage: §8Holding weapon in mainhand, runic in offhand, then right click.
enchantment.kubejs.stench_curse.desc: May release poison cloud on hurt.
enchantment.kubejs.annoying_curse.desc: May anger enemies in range on hit.
enchantment.kubejs.polarized_curse.desc: Unless it's deadly, deals 1.5x or 0 damage.
enchantment.kubejs.anti_entropy_curse.de: May set user on fire and freeze the attacker.
enchantment.kubejs.transfer_curse.desc: Transfer the first effect of user to target.
enchantment.kubejs.beheading_curse.desc: Beheads user if its health ratio is low.
enchantment.kubejs.overflow_curse.desc: May summon random area effect cloud on taking hit.
enchantment.kubejs.purity_curse.desc: Remove all poion effects on taking hit.
enchantment.kubejs.metabolism_curse.desc: Converts hunger into health on taking hit.
enchantment.kubejs.outcast_curse.desc: Decrease invulunerable time on taking hit.
enchantment.kubejs.abyss_curse.desc: Deal extra damage based on types of curses on user's armors.
enchantment.kubejs.undead_curse.desc: Might invert heal and harm for short on taking hit.
enchantment.kubejs.entanglement_curse.de: Might be immobilized and grant resistance effect for short on taking hit.
enchantment.kubejs.mountain_king.desc: Deals extra damage equals to fall distance, and resets fall distance.
enchantment.kubejs.dueling.desc: Knockback other entities within range based on level and fall distance.
enchantment.kubejs.giant_slayer.desc: Deals 3% of the target's max health as extra damage to large-sized enemies.
enchantment.kubejs.kinetics.desc: Deals extra damage based on the speed of user or user's vehicle.
enchantment.kubejs.beheading.desc: Beheads target if its health ratio is low.
enchantment.kubejs.soul_ignition.desc: Ignite nearby non-targets with soul fire.
enchantment.kubejs.lethal.desc: Lesser armor points make you deal more damage.
enchantment.kubejs.challenger.desc: Deal extra damage based on your determination.
enchantment.kubejs.strike.desc: Deal extra damage to target in air.
enchantment.kubejs.exorcism.desc: Deal extra damage to target that has enchanted armors.
enchantment.kubejs.breach.desc: Deal extra damage based on target's armor points.
enchantment.kubejs.blessed.desc: Increase invulunerable time on taking hit.
enchantment.kubejs.luna.desc: At night, deal extra damage based on moon phase.
enchantment.kubejs.golden_cudgel.desc: Jump + right click to somersault, shift + right click to change scale.
